content.query:
DROP MASTER KEY
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'VerySecretPassword@@';

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SalesDataCredentials
    WITH IDENTITY = 'user', Secret = '5k89N5ixOmJJ2dhOGmz/Xi6XbRLpTYxgT+guSujk4yFDQVfw7RbwYZcuE6woaWrPpQcQm2nfeIiv+AStooqQTQ==';

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE SalesDataSource WITH
( TYPE = HADOOP,
LOCATION = 'abfs://sales@chalkilinkedin.dfs.core.windows.net',
CREDENTIAL =SalesDataCredentials
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT textdelimited1
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
        FIRST_ROW = 2
        )
);

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.DailySales_poly
(
    StoreCode VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    SaleDate DATETIME2 NOT NULL,
    TotalSales INT NOT NULL,
    TotalAmount INT NOT NULL
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'SalesData/sales-1.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = SalesDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = textdelimited1,
    REJECT_TYPE = value,
    REJECT_VALUE = 0
);

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM dbo.DailySales_poly
